TopicTitle: I remembered a program called the Secret Show...

Articles.Content:
I looked it up on YouTube.

There was one scene I cringed at.

'This isn\'t any little pony. This is MY little pony.'

The pony she was flying on the back of proceeded to transform into a sort of bright pink half pony half fighter jet abomination that fired some missiles at Doctor Doctor [the evil genius], which then exploded into flowers that did no harm to her whatsoever. For some reason, I was the one breathing a sigh of relief at that last part. If the entire storyline had led up the the main characters being saved by a pony, I might well have attempted to incinerate the BBC\'s Broadcasting House.
How long ago was this?

How long ago was this?

Several hours ago.

Just to make it clear, I do not actually intend to commit arson, let alone on a building as important as Broadcasting House, let alone at half past one in the morning. [it is now 4:55 AM.]

Several hours ago.

Just to make it clear, I do not actually intend to commit arson, let alone on a building as important as Broadcasting House, let alone at half past one in the morning. [it is now 4:55 AM.]

Lol I didn\'t think you ever did. I thought this post was extremely funny. Got a youtube link?

I have to say, it was a very similar pony.

The bit at the start about \'Fluffy fluffy bunnies\' is over quickly. Quickly and professionally. It\'ll be more funny if I don\'t explain how and you just watch.

The Secret Show - Secret Sleep

I have to say, it was a very similar pony.

The bit at the start about \'Fluffy fluffy bunnies\' is over quickly. Quickly and professionally. It\'ll be more funny if I don\'t explain how and you just watch.

The Secret Show - Secret Sleep

My god, I thought you might have meant that. That show made me laugh my ass off a couple of times. Picky Wicky Pockets, the end.
Hey i remmebr that show, i watched it a lto when iwas like 3 years younger

Hahaha. Breaking the fourth wall again.

This show is hilarious.
oh god i loved this show
Shame for me that Dogstar isn\'t on YouTube. I liked that programme.
What do you have against ponies?

What do you have against ponies?

Everything.

You didn\'t know?

Everything.

You didn\'t know?

Haters everywhere...

Haters everywhere...

Its a legitamate concern. The brony community is highly extroverted. When you mix a highly extroverted community with a TV show intended for small children [but happens to have some adult humour], you will get people who resent it. You brought the haters on yourselves by trying to \'love and tolerate\' everyone until you were shoving love and tolerance down people\'s throats.

I can get along with bronies. I\'d just prefer that they kept their viewing interest mostly within their own community. So you think its a good program, well tell someone who you think will like it. Not some 16 year old British person who is more interested in how cow farts help cause global warming than a children\'s TV show starring sub-equines.
That show was on a LONG while ago. I really actually enjoyed it.

Not some 16 year old British person who is more interested in how cow farts help cause global warming than a children\'s TV show starring sub-equines.

That is exactly why the AMLPR was established.

My Little Pony will be long forgotten before you can break my defenses.

I not against MLP, but against Overponyisme.

Awww, look at all the love and tolerance in this thread.

*pets everyone*

Good work keeping it civil.

I remember this.

That poor granny - they had a new way to take down her set EVERY episode.

I remember this.

That poor granny - they had a new way to take down her set EVERY episode.

Sweet Old Grandpa was a badass banjo player, and he made off with the bunnies successfully.
Just awesome watching them take down the Fluffy Bunny Show...

Just awesome watching them take down the Fluffy Bunny Show...

There was one where an UZZ submarine bursts up through the floor. Sweet Old Grandma\'s rocking chair was sitting on the conning tower next to Ray. The bunnies seemed to disappear through ICBM ports.
